comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: This section is for Bitcoin mining it must be moved to the altcoin mining section.Anyway, since you are mining RVN+Zil there is a guide on youtube on how to do it you need to create a new flightsheet for dual mining but the guide on youtube is n9t for teamredminer you need to switch to nanominer watch the video below.- https://youtu.be/JAqcWacUBZw?t=422
